p: In this study, we examined the occurrence of EV71 infection during the period from 2007 to 2012 according to the National EV Surveillance System in the ROK. The present study included clinical records of EV71-infected patients and analysis of laboratory findings, including determination of genetic differences between outbreaks in the ROK and those in other countries. Moreover, in this study, we found that EV71 infection exhibited a seasonal trend based on epidemiological information for EV71 infection and focused on EV71 infection as an etiological risk factor associated with complications.
